issues.description: The problem statement (and solution implementation) specifies a StockIngredient constructor with three parameters (String name, int price, int quantity), but the template defines only a four-parameter constructor (String name, int price, int quantity, boolean strictValidation). Students following the specification will be unable to instantiate StockIngredient as instructed.
issues.suggested_fix: Modify the template StockIngredient class to include a three-argument constructor (String, int, int) matching the problem statement (e.g., overload the constructor or remove the strictValidation parameter), so students can create StockIngredient(name, price, quantity) directly.
